sourcesContent: import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Note } from 'src/app/core/model/note'; @Component({ selector: 'app-hero-page', templateUrl: './hero-page.component.html', styleUrls: ['./hero-page.component.scss'], }) export class HeroPageComponent { notes: Note[] = []; constructor() { } addNotes(id = '') { let newGroup = new Note(); this.notes.push(newGroup); } removeNote(i: number) { this.notes.splice(i, 1); } updateList() { } }
